integration_patterns: REST APIs for integration with EHR systems

evidence.claim: The company utilizes HL7 standards for health data exchange in their platform.
Lifeline Homecare integrates with EHR systems via REST APIs for seamless data transfer.
Lifeline Homecare systems are designed to comply with HIPAA regulations for patient data security.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or use of clearinghouse services found.
